com.gotenna.sdk.user

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gotenna.sdk.user.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    A model representing the current goTenna User. There is typically only one instance of this class via UserDataStore Created on 2/9/15.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      User()
      Default constructor, name is initialized to empty string, gid initialized to 0.
      User(org.json.JSONObject json)
      Constructor that takes a previously cached JSONObject and turns it back into a User object.

      • createUser

        public static User createUser(java.lang.String name,
              long gId)
        Helper methods for creating a brand new user object.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the user.
        gId - The goTenna ID of the user.
        Returns:
        The created user object with the passed in info.

        Sets the last known time that the user was connected to the goTenna.
        Parameters:
        lastConnectedTime - The last known time that the user was connected to the goTenna.

      • getLastConnectedTime

        public java.util.Date getLastConnectedTime()
        The last known time that the user was connected to the goTenna.
        Returns:
        The last connected date.

      • getLastLocation

        public android.location.Location getLastLocation()
        Retrieves the user's last recorded gps location. This location is set via updateLocation(double, double, float, long)
        Returns:
        The user's last recorded location.

      • updateLocation

        public void updateLocation(double latitude,
                  double longitude,
                  float accuracy,
                  long timestamp)
        Updates the user's last recorded location. This location is cached with the user's basic info.
        Parameters:
        latitude - The user's last recorded latitude.
        longitude - The user's last recorded longitude.
        accuracy - The horizontal accuracy of the recorded location in meters.
        timestamp - The milliseconds timestamp of when the location was recorded.

      • setName

        public void setName(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the user's name i.e.) John Doe.
        Parameters:
        name - The user's name.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        The name of the user i.e.) John Doe.
        Returns:
        The user's name.

      • initials

        public java.lang.String initials()
        The users initials based on their name. Spaces in the name string are used to create the initials. 'John' will become 'J' 'John Doe' will become 'JD' 'John Thomas Doe' will become 'JTD'
        Returns:
        The user's initials.

      • addGroupGID

        public void addGroupGID(java.lang.Long groupGID)
        Adds the group GID to the list of the user's valid group GIDs. This method is called automatically via GTCommandCenter.createGroupWithGIDs(List, GTCommandCenter.GTGroupInviteResponseListener, GTCommandCenter.GTGroupInviteErrorListener) It is also automatically called when an incoming GTGroupCreationMessageData is detected.
        Parameters:
        groupGID - The group GID to add.

      • hasGroupGID

        public boolean hasGroupGID(java.lang.Long groupGID)
        Checks to see if this group GID is already listed as one of the user's valid group GIDs.
        Parameters:
        groupGID - The group GID to check.
        Returns:
        True if this group GID already exists in the user's info, false otherwise.

      • deleteGroupGID

        public void deleteGroupGID(java.lang.Long groupGID)
        Removes the group GID from the user's list of valid GIDs.
        Parameters:
        groupGID - The group GID to delete.

      • getGroupGIDs

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Long> getGroupGIDs()
        Retrieves the list of the GIDs of all the groups this user belongs to.
        Returns:
        The list of group GIDs.

      • toJSONObject

        public org.json.JSONObject toJSONObject()
        Serialized the user's info into a JSONObject so that it can be cached.
        Returns:
        The serialized info inside a JSONObject
